data.title: Visit Henry County, Georgia
data.meta_description: With 20 acres, Avalon Park has it all. From playgrounds, football fields, and a roller hockey rink, it's the perfect destination for outdoor fun. Just 30 minutes south of Atlanta.
data.text:
20 Acres

2 Playground Areas

4 Lighted Football Fields

Park and Ride

Roller Hockey Rink

If you’re searching for a free, family-friendly attraction while vacationing in or visiting Henry County, look no further than Avalon Park in McDonough. Positioned just 30 minutes south of Atlanta and 10 minutes from McDonough’s charming downtown district, the park is conveniently located at 1045 Industrial Parkway, McDonough, GA 30253. For more information about the park’s amenities, contact Avalon Park at 770-288-7300.

Football Fields, Playgrounds and More

Featuring a 26,000 sq. ft. open-air pavilion with a covered 12,750 sq. ft. in-line hockey rink, Avalon Park is a great place to watch a game or have a family picnic. Within the 20 acres are four lighted football fields – including three standard fields and one practice field – a concession stand, restrooms, a press box and dressing rooms.

Besides the roller hockey rink and football fields, Avalon Park features two playgrounds, so your kids can burn some energy under the Georgia sun. In addition, the park also serves as a park-and-ride area, letting you catch a ride out of McDonough and travel to Downtown Atlanta, Monday – Friday, via Xpress Route 430.
